FAQs Where can I purchase a Gentex mirror for my vehicle? Contact automotive OEM dealer parts/accessory group or visit our after market distributor: Voxx Electronics Corporation Visit Website or call 800.371.7725 How do I install the aftermarket mirror I purchased Reference the install manual that came with your product or contact the company/person from whom you purchased your product. Also you can visit our after market distributor. Voxx Electronics Corporation Visit Website or call 800.371.7725 How do I get the schematics to install my rear view mirror? ​Gentex Corporation does not disclose schematic information for product installations. What if my product was not purchased from an approved after market distributor or automotive OEM dealer parts/accessory group? All aftermarket purchases must be made through Voxx Electronics Corporation . Gentex does not provide installation support or assistance with products purchased through any other source. Gentex does not support the following business: eBay, Amazon, Craigslist, salvage yards, etc. How do I program my HomeLink® buttons to my garage door opener? Visit www.homelink.com or call 1‐800‐355‐3515. How do I know if the mirror is dimming correctly? ​ Click to view the Auto-Dimming Troubleshooting Guide How do I calibrate the compass on my mirror? ​ Click to view the Compass Calibration Troubleshooting Guide How do I know if the compass heading is correct? ​ Click to view our trouble shooting tree Contact automotive OEM dealer parts/accessory group or visit our after market distributor: Voxx Electronics Corporation Visit Website or call 800.371.7725 Reference the install manual that came with your product or contact the company/person from whom you purchased your product. Also you can visit our after market distributor. Voxx Electronics Corporation Visit Website or call 800.371.7725 ​Gentex Corporation does not disclose schematic information for product installations. All aftermarket purchases must be made through Voxx Electronics Corporation . Gentex does not provide installation support or assistance with products purchased through any other source. Gentex does not support the following business: eBay, Amazon, Craigslist, salvage yards, etc. Visit www.homelink.com or call 1‐800‐355‐3515. ​ Click to view the Auto-Dimming Troubleshooting Guide ​ Click to view the Compass Calibration Troubleshooting Guide ​ Click to view our trouble shooting tree *Important Notices Note: All aftermarket purchases must be made through a dealer or VOXX Electronics Corporation . Gentex does not provide installation support or assistance with products purchased through any other source. Note: Auto dealers should contact the OEM technical hotline before submitting an inquiry to Gentex. When seeking additional instructions, always be sure to reference your owner's manual first. Contact the company/party from whom you purchased your mirror if you have issues with it for any reason. Group Patents If your HomeLink product features a group patent identification instead of the 8-digit identification number, please select the patent group from the chart below to view the applicable patents. Locate my patent group Group A Group AC Group AE Group AH Group AJ Group AK Group G Group P Group R, W Group S Group T Group V Group Y Group Z If your HomeLink product features a group patent identification instead of the 8-digit identification number, please select the patent group from the chart below to view the applicable patents. Locate my patent group Patent Search For your reference, the tool below will display the United States patents that cover a specific product when the lot number (located on the back of the mirror or module) is entered into the box below. Locate my lot number Please note that this tool works for all mirrors manufactured beginning June 2012, and HomeLink products beginning February 2013. For all products manufactured before those dates, the patent information can be found on a label located inside the mirror's housing or on the module. We apologize for any inconvenience you are experiencing with your Gentex product. Please complete and submit this form and a response will be sent to you shortly. Filling out this form is the best way for Gentex to assist you in resolving your concern. If, after you have filled out the form, you would like to speak to a product support representative, please call 1-877-475-1777.
